snippet: Police officials said they had no indication that the suspect, Ashleigh Wade, was actually expecting a child, and neighbors said they had not seen signs that she was.
abstract: Police investigators report Ashleigh Wade of Bronx, who has been charged with murder in connection with stabbing of Angelikque Sutton inside Wade's Wakefield apartment, left elaborate trail of messages supporting false story she was pregnant; Wade stabbed Sutton, who was nine months pregnant, and is believed to have cut Sutton's baby, which survived, from her womb in attack.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and EMILY PALMER

lead_paragraph: Police officials said they had no indication that the suspect, Ashleigh Wade, was actually expecting a child, and neighbors said they had not seen signs that she was.

headline.main: Woman Charged in Grisly Death of Pregnant Mother Left a Cryptic Trail
headline.print_headline: Suspect in Pregnant Woman’s Death Left Cryptic Trail
